Topic.Title: bro why i cant open the +18 game?

Posts.EditableText: im putting a valid DOB but the game is not opening help!!!11!!!111
Posts.HTML: im putting a valid DOB but the game is not opening help!!!11!!!111

Posts.EditableText: If you changed your DOB, you need to logout and login again before it will update your 18+ status.
Posts.HTML: If you changed your DOB, you need to logout and login again before it will update your 18+ status.
